name: 8-bit Thief
description:
Every piece of art & code was made entirely from scratch (no libraries, pure js)

If you have trouble with the controls: go to my website & play it there: http://www.noxilex.ovh/Projects/2D/Games/Internal_...

It has the latest updates.

Goal:

  • Get all the art from the pixel art museum but don't get caught by the guard !

Controls:

  • Arrow keys
